title: 5 courses to help you turn out that first novel or screenplay — and get paid for it, too
text:
There’s a great story inside each of us, and while we weren’t all born with the writing talent of Hemingway or Melville, that doesn’t mean we can’t tease these stories out into the published world.

The truth is that with a combination of grit, determination, and training, anyone can make it as a successful writer. Whether you want to write your first novel or screenplay, The Become a Professional Creative Writer Bundle can get you started out on the right foot, and it’s on sale for only $21 in the TNW Deals Shop.

This five-course collection is designed to prepare you for writing your own prose, novel, or movie. Each course is led by Jim Bruce, an online expert who knows what goes into creating amazing novels and movie scripts. Plus, he’s an absolute beast at playing blues guitar, which isn’t really relevant to writing, but still good to know.

And, make no mistake, this bundle isn’t going to bog you down with an endless stream of bland tutorials. Each course is lean, mean, and ready to be consumed in no more than an hour, so you can get to writing like a pro sooner.
